channel.title: Client Error - Java not recognized
channel.description:
Hello.
Every time i try getting on my client i get a error which says
[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
I've got java6 update 10 and my CLASSPATH and PATH are below
CLASSPATH [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code]
PATH [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;[/code]
Please help me
Much Appriciated[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2008, 06:50:13 am[/size][hr]Also Now when i try to runserver i get this error [code]The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Client Error - Java not recognized
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

Try putting that in the .bat file, the 6_10.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Error - Java not recognized
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

Edit the Variable Name!

CLASSPATH = classpath

NO CAPITALS!

Read full topic
